game.pearlcontrol.description:
Control the area or push all
your opponents to win the game.
Use your pearls to catch up and
not die.
game.rushtheflag.description:
Capture the opponent's flag and
bring it back to your base. Use
your ability to surprise your opponents
and defeat them more easily.
game.therunner.description:
Run as fast as possible to the center
of the map without making mistakes.
Arrive first to gain an advantage and beat
your opponents! Choose a challenge
to earn better rewards and become
the best!
game.bridger.description:
Practice bridge and achieve the
best time. Win medals to move up
in the ranking and earn rewards!
game.bedwars.description:
Protect your bed and destroy those
of other opponents. Kill all the players
to win the game.
game.lasergame.description:
Shoot your opponents to gain a maximum
of points. Collect the bonuses dispersed
on the map to obtain useful abilities.
game.getdown.description:
Drop down the map while
collecting coins to eliminate
your opponents!
game.sheepwars.description:
Eliminate the enemy team with
many sheeps that give random effects:
explosion, teleportation, healing, etc.
game.casino.roller-machines.name: Roller machines
game.casino.wwtbam.name: Who wants to be a milionaire ?
